subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{och-l|之|to go; to proceed}} + endopassive voicing + endoactive tone B ({{zh-l|*上聲}}), literally “that which is proceeding” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

# [[occasionally]]

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=し'|-}} {{ltc-l|時}}. The ''{{ll|ja|呉音|goon}}'' reading, so likely the initial borrowing.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|じ}}
* The pitch accent depends on the entire appended word.
